page.title: 11A Day in my Life by Kathryn
page.content: On Tuesday morning I got up and put my{school}uniform on, washed, went downstairs and my mam had my breakfast ready. I ate it all up, looked out of the window and saw the bus and 'me and my mam' threw up our hands, grabbed our coats and ran out. I got on the bus and came to school with Dawn. When our school bell rings I go in, hang up my coat, get my hymn book and go into the hall for assembly. Then it is English until playtime and I play hopscotch. Playtime lasts for 15 minutes. After play I go to maths. I am on to book two and my mam thinks I am doing very well. I have my dinner at home and I go back to school on the 1 o'clock bus. After school I have swimming lessons at the {Leisure Centre}and when I get back I have my tea. After tea I watch T.V.. I go to bed at 8 o'clock.
